question: I would greatly like to see a general Endocrinology forum created.  An ask the Dr. one would also be nice.  Many of us frequent mulitple boards, diabetes, thryoid, pituitary tumor, etc... I haven't been able to find anything that deals much with adrenals.   So a general board would be very nice so we could all discuss the symptoms and problems we have one one endocrine gland goes haywire and causes others to have effects as well.Thank you!
title: Endocrine Disorder Forum
